menu.prompt: Hello! Welcome to AutoGiant Motors. How can I assist you today? Please type a number to select an option:

general.prompt: I can help with general questions. You can ask about our location, working hours, or contact information. Or, type 'back' to go to the main menu.

queries.reply: Our main dealership is located at [Your Dealership Address]. You can also find us on Google Maps. We are open Monday to Saturday from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
Our working hours are Monday to Saturday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM. We are closed on Sundays and public holidays.
You can reach us at +254 7XX XXX XXX or email us at info@autogiantmotors.co.ke. We look forward to hearing from you!

vehicle.prompt: I can provide details on our vehicles. You can ask about a specific model, price, or VAT. What would you like to know? Type 'back' to return to the main menu.

queries.reply: Vehicle prices vary by model and year. Could you please specify the model you are interested in? Our prices are listed on the product pages.
For detailed specifications, please visit the specific vehicle's product page. All details are available there.
Our listed prices are generally inclusive of VAT unless stated otherwise. Please check the product description for confirmation on a specific vehicle.

deals.prompt: We have new deals and promotions weekly! You can browse our active deals on the 'Today's Deals' page. Is there a specific type of deal you are looking for? Type 'back' to return to the main menu.

queries.reply: All of our current deals are available on the 'Today's Deals' page. We offer various promotions, including discounts and special financing options.

financing.prompt: I can provide general information on financing and importation. What would you like to know? Type 'back' to return to the main menu.

queries.reply: We offer flexible financing options through our partners. Please visit our 'Financing' page or contact a sales representative for more details.
All of our vehicles are imported through trusted partners. The importation process takes approximately 4-6 weeks. For specific timelines and documentation, please speak with our team.

fallback: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Please try rephrasing your question or type 'main' to return to the main menu.
